name: Beer Pong Trick
description:
If you love beer pong, this game will captivate you.
Over 230 levels one more beautiful than the other, including tables, shelves, walls and many other obstacles to overcome to reach your goal simple: center the glass of beer!

Hoping that you enjoy it, do not hesitate to send suggestions to improve the game or for new levels to our email address.

HAVE FUN!!
